column4: I've chown and chgrp a bunch of mp3s and a directory I want to move them to to my name and my group, but can't move them to the directory without sudo. Why?
What are the permissions on the destination folder?
also owned by me and in my group, also can't move it
Can you pastebin ls -l on the files and ls -l on the dest folder?
The only way that shouldn't be working is if you're not logged in as john
